tool_description: Monitors competitor pricing across multiple channels and products to provide real-time competitive intelligence for pricing decisions.

competitor_ids.description: List of competitor identifiers to monitor

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to track across competitors

monitoring_frequency.description: How often to check prices: hourly, daily, weekly

error_messages: Invalid competitor ID: One or more competitor identifiers are not recognized or accessible.
Invalid product ID: One or more product IDs are not found in the monitoring system.
Invalid monitoring frequency: Use one of [hourly, daily, weekly].
Rate limit exceeded: Too many monitoring requests, reduce frequency or number of targets.
usage: Provide competitor_ids and product_ids to monitor, optionally set monitoring_frequency. Returns current and historical competitor pricing data.

price_trends.description: Price trend indicators (increasing, decreasing, stable) per competitor-product
